lead_paragraph: The car is 2.6 inches higher than the standard S60 and gets decent fuel economy, but trunk space is a serious shortcoming.
snippet: The car is 2.6 inches higher than the standard S60 and gets decent fuel economy, but trunk space is a serious shortcoming.

headline.main: Video Review: With the S60, Volvo Adds a Sedan to Its Cross Country Line
headline.print_headline: With the S60, Volvo Adds a Sedan to Its Cross Country Line

abstract: Driven column review of Volvo S60 Cross Country.
